message:
‎"... if you email pictures taken with your cell phone, especially of children or valuables in your home, DON’T! .... be very aware that you may be giving your address to the whole world if you put one of these pictures on 'facebook' or 'youtube,' for example. Or your email may be intercepted. Email is ridiculously hackable."

http://canadafreepress.com/index.php/article/33477
